name: Flag of Catalonia with Barcelona
description:
A pixel art rendition of Barcelona's skyline on the Senyera, the flag of Catalonia. 

Left to right: 
1 FC Barcelona Crests. 
2 The Montjuïc Communications Tower. 
3 The W Barcelona Hotel ( l'Hotel Vela). 
4 The Sagrada Família, 
5 The Venetian Towers (Les Torres Venetianes). 
6 The Four Coluumns (Les Quatre Columnes), between the Venetian Towers.
7 The Montjuïc Cable Car (El Telefèric de Montjuïc) in the background. (The cable car didn't make it into the final canvas)
8 A Casteller wearing a Barretina standing atop the Columbus Monument (Monument a Colom). 

Skyline designed, built and maintained by r/PlaceCatalunya in collaboration with r/Catalunya & r/Barna. Alliance hearts at intersections with surrounding communities.
